name: wordpress
description: WordPress is a widely-used content management system for building self-hosted websites and blogs. It offers themes, plugins, user management, REST APIs, and an extensible editor, powering everything from simple sites to complex portals.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Create and edit posts and pages with a block-based visual editor or classic text interface

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Customize site appearance with thousands of free and premium themes or build custom designs

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with over 60,000 plugins for SEO, e-commerce, forms, and more

features.title: User Management
features.description: Define roles and permissions for authors, editors, administrators, and custom user types

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and organize images, videos, and documents with built-in editing tools

features.title: REST API
features.description: Access content programmatically for headless CMS setups and mobile app integration
